body:
Comment 5 by **flozano**: 
'will take "command" for everything' is clearly a bad description, my apologies for that.

Anyway I see minux understood my problem. Thanks for the hint on the FlagSet, after
taking a look at the source I managed to make it work perfectly in my use-case and thus
my initial request makes no sense, it was just my poor knowledge of the API. Maybe some
examples using directly FlagSet.Parse()  and not the plain Parse() would help a little.

Thank you!
